tasks.coref.bionlp

Class BioNLPCoreferencePipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.coref.bionlp.BioNLPCoreferencePipeline

  • public class BioNLPCoreferencePipeline
extends java.lang.Object
    The pipeline used to resolve coreference in BioNLP protein coreference dataset. This pipeline only deals with CoreferenceType.Anaphora type.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BioNLPCoreferencePipeline()

      Resolves coreference in a single BioNLP coreference dataset document.

      Adds a CoreferenceChain object to the document, given the textual units involved in it.

      Reads properties from coref_bionlp.properties file and initializes WordNet, resolution strategies and coreference-related word lists.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BioNLPCoreferencePipeline

        public BioNLPCoreferencePipeline()

    • Method Detail

      • loadBioNLPCoreferenceStrategies

        public static java.util.List<Strategy> loadBioNLPCoreferenceStrategies()
        Loads the resolution strategies used for the BioNLP coreference dataset.
        Returns:
        the list of resolution strategies.

      • coreferenceResolution

        public static void coreferenceResolution(Document doc)
        Resolves coreference in a single BioNLP coreference dataset document. It recognizes coreferential mention and then identifies coreference relations. For BioNLP dataset, this only includes anaphora relations.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • mentionReferentLinking

        public static void mentionReferentLinking(Document doc)
        Links coreferential mentions to their referents and generates CoreferenceChain objects.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • generateCoreferenceChain

        public static void generateCoreferenceChain(Document doc,
                                            SurfaceElementChain chain)
        Adds a CoreferenceChain object to the document, given the textual units involved in it. It performs consistency checks, merges mentions into other coreference chains, and handles chains involving coordinated items.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document being processed
        chain - the chain of textual units

      • coreferenceChainToBioNLPStandoffAnnotation

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> coreferenceChainToBioNLPStandoffAnnotation(CoreferenceChain cc)
        Converts a CoreferenceChain object to a list of standoff annotation lines as expected for BioNLP protein coreference dataset.
        Parameters:
        cc - the coreference chain
        Returns:
        a list of corresponding standoff annotation lines

      • init

        public static void init()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Reads properties from coref_bionlp.properties file and initializes WordNet, resolution strategies and coreference-related word lists.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the properties file cannot be found

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
